data.title: Fethard Deaths since 1988 (from available records)
data.text:
FETHARD DEATHS

from 1988 to 2020

| 2020 | 2019 | 2018 | 2017 | 2016 | 2015 | 2014 | 2013 | 2012 | 2011 | 2010 | 2009 | 2008 | 2007 | 2006 | 2005 | 2004 | 2003 | 2002 | 2001 | 2000 | 1999 | 1998 | 1997 | 1996 | 1995 | 1994 | 1993 | 1992 | 1991 | 1990 | 1989 | 1988

The following is a list of deaths in the parish since 1988, we have also included many of the deaths (from information supplied) of Fethard people who died outside the parish.

Where possible we have also included, in brackets, the place of funeral service. If you know of any death that is not included please let us know.
